fullName.jp: アラネア・ハイウィンド

description.jp: ニフルハイム帝国軍に所属し赤い揚陸艇を駆る空中機動師団の准将。気っ風の良い姉御肌で 面倒見が良く部下からの信頼は厚い。魔導兵器の槍を自在に使った素早い空中戦を得意としており その腕前は「竜騎士」の異名が付くほどのもの。
description.gl: Commodore of a Niflheim airborne division who pilots a red assault craft. Her subordinates, whom she takes good care of, trust in her implicitly. Her speed and skill in the air with a magitek lance has deservedly earned her the moniker "the Dragoon."

jp.text: しっかりしなよ 先があんでしょ
これ 倒しちゃっていい？
あんたたち 先に逃げな
あたしは\n生きようとしない人間は助けない
自分が信じるものくらい 自分で決めな
良い顔になったじゃない

gl.text: In the meantime、 handle what's at hand.
Mind if I finish this one off?
Get your asses out of here、 all of you!
Lose your will to live、 and you lose all hope of me helping your sorry ass. Got it?
Figure out what it is you're really after here.
The boy has become a man.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_アラネア
name.jp: コールアビリティ_アラネア

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Highwind (C)] \n• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV\n• Increases Critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
rank_up_desc.gl: When using Highwind (C):\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%\n • Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ハイウィンド【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・クリティカル時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ

name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_アラネア
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_アラネア

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Vermilion Assault (C)]
• Becomes 6-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack 
　+ Increases BRV by 20% HP damage dealt
　+ 6-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Vermilion Assault (C):
 • 4-hit group ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack delivered 2 times becomes:
   • 6-hit group ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack
   • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
   • 6-hit group ranged BRV  attack + group HP  attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ヴァーミリオンアサルト【C】」使用時
・4HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.gl: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV
desc.jp: 近距離物理攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.en: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage
desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
3-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack

Self: 3 turns [Magitek Armament]; 2 turns [Overclock] when breaking target

While [Overclock] is active 
• [Dragoon Dive] becomes [Dragoon Dive+] 
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 30%
　∟ Delays target by 1 turn
　∟ Cannot grant [Overclock]
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Boost Lance] 
　∟ Increases BRV by 20% Max BRV
　∟ 2-HIT ranged BRV attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 26
• [HP Attack] becomes [High-Boost Lance] 
　∟ 1-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + ST HP attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Deals 10% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Increases HP damage dealt to non-targets by 20% when breaking or attacking broken target
desc.gl:
3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 3 turns Magitek Armament
When inflicting Break:
 • Self: 2 turns Overclock 

While Overclock active:
 • Becomes Dragoon Dive+
 • BRV Attack becomes Boost Lance
 • HP Attack becomes High-Boost Lance
desc.jp:
3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
自身に3ACTION「魔導兵装」付与
ターゲットブレイク時
自身に2ACTION「オーバーブースト」付与
「オーバーブースト」付与中
「ドラゴンリープ＋」に
通常「BRV攻撃」が「ブーストランス」に
通常「HP攻撃」が「ハイブーストランス」に変化

desc.en:
8-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Increases Critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
Deals 100% HP damage to all targets

Self: 2 turns [High-Speed Maneuver]; 4 turns [Overclock] when breaking target

While [Overclock] is active
• Becomes [Air Superiority+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Active [Overclock] duration +2

While [High-Speed Maneuver] is active
• Nullifies Action Delay when inflicting BREAK, grants 1 extra turn
* Extra turn does not increase turn count
* Cannot trigger an additional turn during extra turn

• [Vermilion Assault+]
　　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 240％

desc.gl:
When using Vermilion Assault, Vermilion Assault+:
 • 4-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes:
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
 • 6-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)
 • Adds effect that moderately raises INT BRV to special effect Magitek Lance
desc.jp:
「ヴァーミリオンアサルト」「ヴァーミリオンアサルト＋」使用時
・4HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋6HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
　に変化し合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・使用後 次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
　（一部のアビリティを除く）
・特殊効果「魔導槍」に
　自身の初期BRV中アップの効果追加
